name: Skoda Kushaq
description: The price of Skoda Kushaq, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 11.99  - 20.49 Lakh. It is available in 21 variants, with engine options ranging from 999 to 1498 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Kushaq has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Skoda Kushaq has a ground clearance of 188 mm  and is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.79 to 19.67 kmpl for Kushaq.
